DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study test hypothesis LY518674 , administer 6 week patient mild hypertension , reduce Systolic Blood Pressure , compare placebo .
DOC.brief_title: A Study People With Mild Hypertension
DOC.criteria: 1 . Are men woman 18 70 year age , inclusive 2 . Have give sign informed consent participate study 3 . Are diagnosed mild essential hypertension screening ( currently untreated treat monotherapy ) 1 . Secondary malignant hypertension 2 . Have history hyperlipidemia within 3 month screen require treatment 3 . Any previous cardiovascular disease hypertension 4 . Type 1 2 diabetes
